updates.content:
Cloudflare is experiencing widespread network degradation issues across the globe that can affect all DatoCMS services.

More information here: https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/incidents/tx4pgxs6zxdr

This issue is now fixed and we are monitoring the situation.

The issue is now resolved, Cloudflare reports:

Description:
Major outage impacted all Cloudflare services globally. We saw a massive spike in CPU that caused primary and secondary systems to fall over. We shut down the process that was causing the CPU spike. Service restored to normal within ~30 minutes. Weâ€™re now investigating the root cause of what happened.
